execution_plan.description: Retrieve each order's country and revenue (total_eur) by joining orders to customers in the EU region database. The application will aggregate revenue per country.
execution_plan.query: SELECT c.country, o.total_eur, o.id AS order_id, o.customer_id FROM orders o JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.id WHERE o.total_eur IS NOT NULL;
